header.title: Dime Sarby Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event Planning Meeting
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the Dime Sarby Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event, focusing on logistics, budget, security, and cross-promotional opportunities.
header.attendees: Alia, Sebastian, Jet, Azfar, Kang, Rohimi

tasks.Description: Finalize the exact power strip specifications for the Centre Court layout.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability to get clear figures for the sound system.
Inform the person with the trolling cart to stick with the Centre Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on their quote.
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites.
Lock in Ken Lim's Twitch slot for the Shaver Gaming event.
Handle the Dime Sarby media invites and send them out.
Confirm the costume rack specs with TechZone Co. and email the sketch to eSports Channel and HyperX.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for the Dime Sarby Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event.
Follow up with the Fire Department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for the Dime Sarby Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event.
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear for the Shaver Gaming event and update the shared document.
Map out specific routes and timings for loading and unloading cars for the Dime Sarby Car Showcase, as well as getting gaming equipment in for the Shaver Gaming event, with security considerations.
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mall-goers during setup and teardown for the Dime Sarby Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event.
Talk to eSports Channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV and discuss a casual gaming peripheral review for the Shaver Gaming event with AutoBuzz.
Reach out to HyperX and Logitech, the Shaver Gaming sponsors, to explore a cross-promotional giveaway that ties into both the Dime Sarby Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming event.
Chase Azfar on the NUJI store renovation fire safety audit to get the clearance sorted.
